title: BRIEF-ARSS Infrastructure Projects' JV Gets 761.6 Mln Rupee-Work Order From Container Corporation Of India
text:
BRIEF-ARSS Infrastructure Projects' JV Gets 761.6 Mln Rupee-Work Order From Container Corporation Of India

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 12:24)

© Reuters. BRIEF-ARSS Infrastructure Projects' JV Gets 761.6 Mln Rupee-Work Order From Container Corporation Of India Oct 18 (Reuters) - ARSS Infrastructure Projects Ltd : * CO'S JV ARSS-BDPL(JV) GETS 761.6 MILLION RUPEE-WORK ORDER FROM CONTAINER CORPORATION OF INDIA
